attributes.action: Change the rights of the people in the UK to become a priority.
attributes.additional_details:
STOP people entering the country without visa and reason. 
STOP giving others everything that haven't paid into the system.
STOP putting others before your own. 

GIVE more money to the councils.
HELP house homeless people.
SUPPORT each other.
BUILD more affordable houses. 
CHANGE policies and procedures around housing people in need. 

UK government need to put their own people furst like every other country does.
STOP giving out handouts! 

Our human rights count too!
attributes.background: STOP housing asylum seekers and sort the housing within their own council/goverment first.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

The Government has a legal obligation to accommodate people seeking asylum in the UK, but has recently introduced legislation to “prevent and deter unlawful migration, and in particular migration by unsafe and illegal routes, by requiring the removal from the United Kingdom of certain persons who enter or arrive in the United Kingdom in breach of immigration control”. You can find out more about this legislation here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/research-briefings/cbp-9747/

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Stop housing asylum seekers who entered the UK illegally in hotels: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628324

Hold a referendum on how many asylum seekers the UK accepts: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634785

Increase support for homeless people: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631032

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to increase funding for the building of new local authority housing. If you want to start a new petition you'll need to provide your full name.
